name: Mini Envelope Clutch - Black with White Croc
description:
A smaller sized clutch which perfectly fits your phone, cash and lipstick. Tuck under your arm, hold onto it, or have it in your handbag so you lose less stuff.

22cm x 14cm approx
Handmade in New Zealand by Charlie Horse
Soft Black Lamb Leather on flap and back, with White embossed Croc Leather on front.
Brass post closure

Please note, as each item is a hand-made unique creation, actual product may differ slightly from photo.

name: Timmy Tail - Black and White
description:
A brand new accessory for your bag from Charlie Horse. Clip onto your tote, purse or even keys! Timmy Tail is available in various colours - White, Pink, Orange, Blood Red, Green, purple, black and Yellow. 

All but one are affixed to a brass chain and dog clip and White has nickel hardware.

Each fox tail is approximately 13-18'' long. Due to the fact that these tails are 100% authentic fur, each will vary slightly in size and shape.

Please allow a week for this to be shipped as are made to order.
 
Please Note:
Because fur is  natural, some are longer and some are shorter, but each one is unique . Timmy Tail may vary slightly from the photo depending on how rich the colour but this is what makes him yours. You can pretty him up with the hair dryer if his fur gets a little flat and he will be as good as new!

name: Bunny Bomb Bag Charm
description:
Spice up your clutch, tote, carry-all, handbag or even backback with a fluffy bag charm. A new product from Charlie Horse, The Bunny Bomb Bag Charm is sure to add that little something special. They make great gifts but no-one said you can't nab one for yourself! Take your pick of colour - there is one to suit everyone.

8cm approx
Rabbit Fur
String loop to affix to Charlie Horse Clutch of your choice
8 colours available


If a colour is sold out, please email charlie@charliehorseofcourse and we can pre-order you one. We will ship out to you on our next delivery. 
Please note special orders can take 2-3 weeks to be delivered and as each item is a unique creation, actual product may vary slightly in size and length.

name: Charlie Horse Summer Straw Hat
description:
Absolutely everything we want in a summer hat: Made of resilient paper straw, it flattens and folds for easy packing and features an extra-wide brim to keep you cool and protected. It's the one thing we're never without on weekends away and beach getaways.

Paper Straw
Head Circumference: Approx.56-58cm
Brim Width: Approx.15cm
Height: Approx.10cm

name: Claire Clutch - Purple/Leopard Fur/PVC
description:
The Claire Clutch from Charlie Horse is a great sized clutch to fit all the essentials. This stunning bag is easy to tuck under your arm, hold onto it, or have it in your handbag, the perfect addition to any outfit! With stunning leopard cow hide, pvc layer and purple leather contrast.

• Handmade in New Zealand 
• PVC layer on top of Leopard Hair on Hide, purple leather 
• Brass post closure

description:

• Handmade in New Zealand 
• PVC layer on top of Metallic Silver Woven fabric, tan leather 
• Brass post closure
